Text: If this doesn't scare the f*ck out of you, I don't know what will. The Trump I knew was a broken little coward for sure, but a sadist, dreaming of becoming a dictator. He is the kind of thug who would smile at public executions. @realDonaldTrump

Do you remember when Sir Patrick Vallance said we'd do well if we could keep the number of #Covid19 deaths to 20,000. Well, today we're almost certainly looking at 100,000+ #Covid19 related deaths if/when we get the predicted second wave. Who's to blame for this? #BorisJohnson
